Package pt.isel.leic.svlc.kubernetes

Class Kubernetes

java.lang.Object
pt.isel.leic.svlc.kubernetes.Kubernetes
public class Kubernetes extends Object
Represents a class that handles the Kubernetes API.

  • Constructor Details

    • Kubernetes

      public Kubernetes(String namespace, String clusterName) throws Exception
      Constructs a Kubernetes instance with the default master URL and namespace.
      Parameters:
      namespace - The namespace to use in the Kubernetes cluster.
      clusterName - The name of the cluster to use.
      Throws:
      Exception - if the Kubernetes client cannot be created.

    • Kubernetes

      @TestOnly public Kubernetes() throws Exception
      Constructs a Kubernetes instance with the default master URL and namespace.
      Throws:
      Exception - if the Kubernetes client cannot be created.

    • getNodeStatus

      public Map<String,String> getNodeStatus(String nodeName, ListConfig config) throws io.kubernetes.client.openapi.ApiException
      Gets the status of one node in the Kubernetes cluster.
      Parameters:
      nodeName - The name of the node to get the status from.
      config - The configuration to list the nodes.
      Returns:
      A map containing the status of the specified node in the Kubernetes cluster or null if the node is not found.
      Throws:
      io.kubernetes.client.openapi.ApiException

    • deployFromYaml

      public String deployFromYaml(String yaml, CreateConfig config) throws io.kubernetes.client.openapi.ApiException, IOException
      Deploys a Kubernetes resource from a YAML file.
      Parameters:
      yaml - The YAML file to deploy.
      config - The configuration to deploy the resource.
      Returns:
      A message indicating the resource was deployed successfully.
      Throws:
      io.kubernetes.client.openapi.ApiException - if the resource cannot be deployed.
      IOException - if the YAML file cannot be read.
